data.text: @PHLPublicHealth @PhiladelphiaGov MASKS ARE IMPORTANT, BUT THERE ARE OTHER LOCAL ISSUES TO CONSIDER. THE #PHILLY ART COMMISSION FAILS TO LISTEN TO THE PUBLIC WHEN APPROVING PUBLIC ART!
